== Curti (CT) (626870) ==

Curti (CT) is a town in the [[PONDA 006]] taluka of [[NORTH GOA]] district with an area of 7.7 sq. km. and harbouring 3859 households with total population of 16385 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 32 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 32 km. Male population is 8726 and female population is 7659. Scheduled Caste population is 233 and Scheduled Tribes population is 971. Census Location Code of the town is 626870<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 130 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 511 km. Railway station is at MARGAO at a distance of 35 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open and closed drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 1400 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at PONDA (2 km) .
